price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Tenyenya rero gato, urindire ubutungane bw’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, kandi ntiwihute ngo ube nk’Intumwa Yunusu mwene Matta (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) yatamiwe n’ifi amahanga, igihe yatwarwa n’agashavu, ikananirwa kwihangana, igaheza igatabaza n’ishavu n’agahinda Imana yayo Rurema Allah ko Yokwihutira guhana abagarariji;
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika walā takun kaṣāḥibi al-ḥūti idh nādā wahuwa makẓūmun
